summary: THE POWER WINDOWS JAMMED UP, WHICH CAUSED THEM NOT TO ROLL UP OR DOWN.   *JB   THE POWER WINDOWS ROLLED UP ALL THE WAY, BUT FAILED TO ROLL DOWN ON THE TWO FRONT WINDOWS AND THE RIGHT REAR DOOR WINDOW.  PROBLEMS WITH WINDOWS SINCE THE PURCHASE OF THE VEHICLE.  THE DEALER CLAIMED THEY FIXED THE PROBLEM BUT THAT LASTED ONE DAY AND ALSO SUGGESTED THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH THIS MAKE/MODEL AND THERE WAS NO REMEDY.  OTHER DEALERS HAVE SAID THE SAME THING.  THE ONLY WAY THE WINDOW  WORKED IS IF THE CONSUMER HIT THE DOOR WITH HIS FIST BETWEEN THE PANEL,SPEAKER, AND THE DOOR POCKET WHILE HOLDING THE WINDOW SWITCH IN THE DOWN POSITION.   *SCC  *JB
